title: Bug 137464 - Data Preview Not Refreshing After Applying Filter in Chart Editor's Select Data Page
description: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview part is not refreshing. Please refer to the attached file for more details.
OB: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview does not refresh. After you apply the filter, the data preview remains unchanged, even though the filter is supposed to have an effect.
EB: The expected behavior is that the data preview should refresh automatically after setting a filter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the attached file.
2. Create a chart and choose the 'Select Data' page.
3. Use the Join dataset and set the X and Y series.
4. Apply a filter to the dataset.
